channel.title: Graphic of the Fortnight - #1
channel.description:
Seeing as though the graphics section is dead, I thought I'd take it upon myself to get more people posting here. Seeing as though the graphics section is dead, I thought I'd take it upon myself to get more people posting here.
[b]1. Must follow the criteria for the appropriate fortnight. 2. All work must be your own. 3. All entries must be on preview on the specified deadline. 4. No Trolling (Serious Submissions Only). 5. Graphic Dimension must be thought through, no need for size rape. 6. Follow Submission form below:[/b]
[code]Username: (seems stupid but do it) Type of Graphic (Wallpaper, Signature etc.): [img] (your image here) [/img] Proof: [img](proof of .psd image here)[/img] [/code]
[center][b]THIS FORTNIGHTS THEME IS CELEBRITIES.[/b] GOOD LUCK TO ALL WHO COMPETE, I'LL POST MY SUBMISSION JUST BEFORE THE DEADLINE.[/center] [center][size=18pt]DEADLINE: 22/07/2013[/size][/center]

item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Amuse_, post:20, topic:517311”]lol i made that from just a render i used it for my signature on 2 forums www.worldscapeblitz.com and www.runerebels.com as my usernames on there are both Wolf.

EDIT:
Here is the render.
Here is the original post on Rune Rebels
If you look at my signature on Rune Rebels it clearly states that i am Amuse_ from Moparscape.[/quote]Alright I’ll let your submission pass. You’re our first entrant congratulations.

What are you talking about? I have not posted any images.

Oops, I meant Host Gushers. I saw your name in his signature
[/quote]His was a quote, if I’m not mistaken?

He posted this:

[/quote]He said that it was his submission and I told him to read rule 2.[/quote]Oh, yeah. I thought he was being sarcastic.

item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:6, topic:517311”]First of all, make this more official. Second, have a clear theme, this make judging much clearer. If you’re going to allow signatures, be very strict about the “All work must be your own.”. Most signatures seems to be other peoples IP with some overlays.[/quote]Ok

Read full topic

item.title: Graphic of the Fortnight - #1

item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

First of all, make this more official. Second, have a clear theme, this make judging much clearer. If you’re going to allow signatures, be very strict about the “All work must be your own.”. Most signatures seems to be other peoples IP with some overlays.

item.title: Graphic of the Fortnight - #1
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

Judging on visuals doesn’t take a mastermind, seeing behind the visuals is a different story. So maybe we can have an open judgement on all pieces where people vote in a poll.

Read full topic
